original: Hall, Gotl. 1. — Studiex., teol. fil. ex, i Upps. 31, teol. kand. 35, prakt, teol. prov samt prästv. f. Visby stift 36. Missiv i Othem, Barlingbo, Väst-kinde, Vänge o. Hejde, kommin. i Rone sed. 39.
translated: Hall, Gotland 1 - Started studies at Uppsala University in 1931, completed degree in philosophy and theology. Also completed practical theological exam and was ordained as a priest for the Visby diocese in 1936. Served as a minister in various parishes including Othem, Barlingbo, Väst-kinde, Vänge, and Hejde. Became a curate in Rone after 1939. Married in 19xx.
